name: project-npm-node-modules
description: NPM test project with existing node_modules directory.

scripts.server-modules: npm install  --prefix ./hdlmv-server express body-parser mysql request async cron helmet
scripts.server-pack: npm run build && rm -rf ./hdlmv-server && mkdir hdlmv-server && pushd hdlmv-server && mkdir app && mkdir config && popd && cp -rf ./ssl ./hdlmv-server && cp -rf ./app/server ./hdlmv-server/app/server && cp -rf ./etl ./hdlmv-server/etl && cp ./server.js ./hdlmv-server/ && cp -rf ./build ./hdlmv-server/ && cp ./config/data-stores.json ./hdlmv-server/config && cp ./config/db.config.js ./hdlmv-server/config && cp ./config/server-config.js ./hdlmv-server/config && npm run server-modules
scripts.server-test: npm run server-sonar-ut && istanbul cover --report lcovonly --dir ./config/test-results/server/ ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive -R tap ./app/server > ./config/test-results/server/tap-results.log
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run client-clean && npm run client-copy && npm-run-all --parallel client-dev server-dev
